info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:43PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lewis and Clark County through 115 PM MDT... At 1242 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Wolf Creek, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Wolf Creek and Canyon Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 216 and 228. Highway 200 between mile markers 70 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
